titleStmt.title: A common vvhore vvith all these graces grac'd: shee's very honest, beautifull and chaste. Written by Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Henry Gosson, and are to be sould in Pannier-Alley,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, imprint has "Pannier-Alley"; B1r last line has "sensuality".
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
